discussion_comments.comment_body: Why are you locking this dependency and others?

I think it was the result of calling `npm install <dep>`. It was not intentional. The only one that's intentional is `ts-node` because after 7.0.0 it got slower. I prefixed all versions instead of `ts-node` with `^`.
